name: Goons of Balatroon
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: GOB is a 2D/3D metaverse with multiple games featuring the community-lovable Goons characters from our sold-out ETH Mainnet NFT collection and card NFTs on Immutable X. The initial product is a premier trading card game (built in-house), followed by a full metaverse and a land-based strategy battle game to be developed by Vulcan Forged.
